text: everyone wants to be liked for who they
really are not just on the surface but
what are ways to make someone genuinely
like you you might be in a new
environment like a new job or school and
making bonds from scratch can be
overwhelming a person liking you is not
entirely under your control however
there are certain things you can do to
influence their perception of you and
make a positive impression in this video
we will explore ways you can become
likable encourage engagement you know
what people love talking about the M
themselves so let them ask them about
their Hobbies passions goals and
Adventures show genuine interest also
people will like you if you remember
what they shared doing this lets you
discover common interests and creates a
positive Bond people are always excited
to talk about the things they love be
the person who starts those kinds of
conversations positive acknowledgement
who doesn't love a compliment right
whether it's their killer outfit or
awesome work a sincere compliment brings
smiles to people's faces and brightens
their day it makes them feel special and
closer to you and when they attach that
Happy Feeling to you it makes them like
you more telling someone how nice they
look or simply appreciating their
efforts is a great way to leave a
lasting positive impression maintain an
open body language when talking to
someone Active Body Language like making
eye contact active listening and
gestures shows genuine interest and
warmth it makes the other person feel
important and connected creating a sense
of comfort and likeability when you lean
in nod and look them in the eye it shows
you're really into the conversation
which makes it more fun for both of you
so keep those gestures friendly maintain
eye contact and lean in a bit it goes a
long way in building Rapport and making
people feel good about talking to you
finding these insights helpful give this
video a thumbs up and subscribe for more
ask for a simple favor or seek
collaboration ever heard of the Benjamin
Franklin effect it's a fascinating
psychological phenomenon where people
tend to like us more after doing us a
small favor psychologists have found
that this effect extends to larger
favors too for instance asking your
colleague for advice or your classmate
to explain something shows you value
their opinions making them feel
important this creates a connection
between you and increases the chances of
doing bigger favors making them like you
more Express
positivity smile a lot if you watch
around blank-faced you will be
unapproachable a smile is like a
friendly invitation to make people feel
relaxed around you smiling triggers a
good first impression which increases
the probability of being
liked Embrace
authenticity in today's world being your
genuine self is super important in any
situation being honest and open about
your thoughts feelings beliefs and
intentions is a way to show authenticity
and stick to your values being yourself
in is endearing quality people are
subconsciously drawn to why because they
see parts of themselves in you that they
are too vulnerable to express themselves
so whenever you find yourself in a new
environment and want to be likable don't
feel pressured to be extroverted or
become who you're not for example
instead of feeling the need to talk
constantly it's okay to focus on active
listening ask questions listen to what
they say and explore common interests
this can create a special connection
give heartfelt compliments and ask for
simple favors to make them warm up to
you and when you disagree on certain
things avoid arguments by respecting
differences and finding a middle ground
and finally smile it exudes joy and
positivity people are drawn to that
laugh freely be nice and be respectful
both to yourself and others and watch
how people are drawn to you one
encounter after another curious about
the secret habits of likable people
watch this video to learn more six
habits that can make someone like you
